document_data.name: Seven Stone Monks Temple
document_data.mainbody: The '''Seven Stone Monks Temple''' was a monastery in [[T'u Lung]], [[Kara Tur]], established at some point before the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: The Seven Stone Monks Temple was a well-known monastic organization, already in existence some years before the {{YearlinkName|1312}}. The monastery's inhabitants were the seven stone monks who possessed powers of divine nature. One notable creation of the seven monks was ''[[Myo-Myo's gong]]'', an enchanted [[shield]] and a [[gong]] wielded by a famous [[ghost]] hunter [[Myo-Myo]]. The seven stone monks etched the gong with geometric patterns and imbued it with the sacred power to perform ''[[holy smite]]'.
